amendment.description: An amendment numbered 55 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to implement COVID-19 vaccine mandates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
